CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Harmonic Inc designs and manufactures video infrastructure products and system solutions to deliver video and broadband services to consumer devices. The firm operates in two segments: Video, which sells video processing, production, and playout solutions to cable operators and satellite and telecommunications providers; and Cable Access, which sells cable edge solutions to cable operators. Roughly half of the firm's revenue is generated in the Americas, with the rest coming from Europe, the Middle East, and Africa, as well as the Asia Pacific region.
